with

the timestamp i just got from select now() the important thing is that you have one timestamp in the SQL

i meant to have the literal timestamp in the SQL. it's very crude, but that way we might have a chance of identifying the file via fulltext-search
PS: when this is done, its fine to be integrated after successful build!

+update c_bankstatement
+set c_doctype_id = (select dt.c_docType_id

+					and dt.DocbaseType = 'CMB' 
+					and dt.DocSubType= 'BS' 
+					limit 1),
